_general instructions.format: This file is a Javascript Object Notation (JSON) string
_general instructions.disable: Disable parameters with a leading underscore in key...

_per-parameter instructions.user: The name of the daemon account (default 'svcuser')
_per-parameter instructions.dbmaxconnections: Limit the number of SQL connections when pooling
_per-parameter instructions.admin: The administrative user role as known by the attribute provider
_per-parameter instructions.log bulk details: whether to generate detailed auditing from bulk operations
_per-parameter instructions.bulk tmp index: whether to index temporary tables used for bulk operations
_per-parameter instructions.bulk tmp cluster: whether to cluster temporary data used for bulk operations
_per-parameter instructions.bulk tmp analyze: whether to analyze temporary data used for bulk operations
_per-parameter instructions.transact cluster: whether to adaptively re-cluster tag tables after transactions
_per-parameter instructions.transact analyze: whether to adaptively re-analyze tag tables after transactions
